title: Bohovska planina
text: Bohovska planina (<a href="Cyrillic%20script">Cyrillic</a>: Боховска планина) is a <a href="mountains%20of%20Serbia">mountain</a> on the border of <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a> and <a href="Bulgaria">Bulgaria</a> , near the town of <a href="Bosilegrad">Bosilegrad</a>. Its highest peak "<a href="Ogorelica">Ogorelica</a>" has an elevation of 1318 meters above sea level.
